          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Family members</string>
            <string language="fi">Perheenjäsenet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Familie Bauteile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Membres de famille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Membros da família</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Membri della famiglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικογενειακά μέλη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Miembros de la familia</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <language>ru</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A connection exercise where the correct family member is connected with the correct counterpart in Russian.</string>
            <string language="fi">Yhdistelytehtävä, jossa yhdistetään oikea perheenjäsen oikeaan venäjänkieliseen vastineeseen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">Opetushallitus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anschlußübung, in der das korrekte Familie
Bauteil mit den korrekten Gegenstücken auf russisch angeschlossen 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice de connexion où le membre correct de
famille est relié aux contre-parties correctes dans le Russe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício da conexão onde o membro correto 
da família seja conectado com as contrapartes corretas no russian.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esercitazione del collegamento dove il membro 
corretto della famiglia è collegato con le controparti corrette nel 
Russo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια άσκηση σύνδεσης όπου το σωστό οικογενειακό μέλος
συνδέεται με το σωστό αντίστοιχο στα ρωσικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio de la conexión donde el miembro 
correcto de la familia está conectado con las contrapartes correctas 
en ruso.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
